title: The Frienzies
body: Hello Fellow Board Members, me and a couple of friends have created an awesome club! The club name is The Frienzies, our only problem is we need more awesome summoners {{champion:32}} ! So if you would like to join add me and send me a IM my IGN if you cant tell already is MiniPlazmoid, i'm online on a day to day basis! So feel Free to {{summoner:4}} over and contact. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: can't add you i think you're in NA :(
